name: part_016
file: tmp_【#ひろがるホロライブDAY1】hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade hololive stage DAY1【チラ見せ】 [Of2b9eBHFS4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_016.mov

scenes.description: Yozora Mel performs her song "Caramel Devil" on stage, interacting with the audience with a mix of singing and spoken dialogue.
Himemori Luna takes the stage to perform her version of "World is Mine," addressing the crowd between lyrics.

subtitles.original: 私ってば全部わかっちゃう。なんたって天才だから！
subtitles.english: I know everything. After all, I'm a genius!

subtitles.original: 何見てたか当てたげようか。あそこの可愛い子。
subtitles.english: Let me guess what you were looking at. That cute girl over there.

subtitles.original: ねぇ一体どういうつもり？分かるんだよそういうのって。
subtitles.english: Hey, what exactly is your intention? I can tell those things.

subtitles.original: 天才なんかじゃなくたって、見てるんだよずっと。
subtitles.english: Even if I weren't a genius, I've been watching you all along.

subtitles.original: 冷めたいくらい様だ足りない。
subtitles.english: It's so cold, it's not enough.

subtitles.original: そんなことばかり言ってたら、どっか行っちゃうからね。
subtitles.english: If you keep saying things like that, I'm going to go somewhere else.

subtitles.original: 冷めたい夢を見ていたい。
subtitles.english: I want to have a cold dream.

subtitles.original: あとで泣いたって、知らないんだから！
subtitles.english: I won't care even if you cry later!

subtitles.original: 結んでみれば 赤い糸。
subtitles.english: If we tie it, it's a red thread of fate.

subtitles.original: 遊び尽くして テンプテーション。
subtitles.english: Playing to my heart's content, temptation.

subtitles.original: 惑わすグラデ 繋がった。
subtitles.english: A confusing gradation, we're connected.

subtitles.original: I'm a caramel devil 欲しがってるわ。
subtitles.english: I'm a caramel devil, I'm wanting you.

subtitles.original: 見惚れてしまえ最高！
subtitles.english: Be mesmerized, it's the best!

subtitles.original: 愛してみて。
subtitles.english: Try to love me.

subtitles.original: 頬を振れるぐらい焦がしてよ。
subtitles.english: Burn me so much it touches my cheeks.

subtitles.original: La la la... 甘い媚薬さ。
subtitles.english: La la la... It's a sweet aphrodisiac.

subtitles.original: もっと離さないで。
subtitles.english: Don't let go anymore.

subtitles.original: 欲しなさい、キャラメル・デビルで。
subtitles.english: Want it, with the Caramel Devil.

subtitles.original: 君の瞳奪っちゃうから。
subtitles.english: Because I'll steal your eyes.

subtitles.original: 私ってば何でもできちゃう。なんたって天才だから！
subtitles.english: I can do anything. After all, I'm a genius!

subtitles.original: どこにいるか言ったげようか。君の後ろ！
subtitles.english: Shall I tell you where I am? Behind you!

subtitles.original: ほらやっぱり照れてんじゃん！門外漢とか嘘ばっか。
subtitles.english: Look, you're blushing after all! Saying you're an outsider is all lies.

subtitles.original: 反省のしなよ、復習してよ。One Two!
subtitles.english: Reflect on it, review it. One Two!

subtitles.original: 冷めたいくらい様だ足りない。
subtitles.english: It's so cold, it's not enough.

subtitles.original: ちょっと目離すとこれなんだから。聞いてんの？
subtitles.english: This is what happens when I take my eyes off you for a bit. Are you listening?

subtitles.original: 溶けない魔法かけられてた。
subtitles.english: I was under an undissolvable spell.

subtitles.original: 控えめなんてわからないの。
subtitles.english: I don't know what being modest is.

subtitles.original: 渡し合いなら 真っ赤一地。
subtitles.english: If we're exchanging, it's all deep red.

subtitles.original: 遊び尽くして 勘違いめ。
subtitles.english: Playing to my heart's content, a misunderstanding.

subtitles.original: 狂っちゃうぐらい 君と痛い。
subtitles.english: I want to be with you so much I go crazy.

subtitles.original: I'm a caramel devil 手の震え。
subtitles.english: I'm a caramel devil, my hands are shaking.

subtitles.original: 欲しがってるわ見惚れてしまえ。
subtitles.english: I'm wanting you, be mesmerized.

subtitles.original: こっち見て。
subtitles.english: Look this way.

subtitles.original: ポニー垂れるぐらい焦がしてよ。
subtitles.english: Burn me so much my ponytail droops.

subtitles.original: 世界中なら La la la... 虜にしちゃう。
subtitles.english: If it's the whole world, La la la... I'll captivate them.

subtitles.original: もっと離さないで。
subtitles.english: Don't let go anymore.

subtitles.original: 欲しなさい、キャラメル・デビルで。
subtitles.english: Want it, with the Caramel Devil.

subtitles.original: 君の瞳奪っちゃうから。
subtitles.english: Because I'll steal your eyes.

subtitles.original: わかってるよ。君じゃなきゃ...
subtitles.english: I know. If it's not you...

subtitles.original: ダメ。その笑顔がいいんだよね。
subtitles.english: No. That smile is what I like.

subtitles.original: I'm a caramel devil 欲しがってるわ。
subtitles.english: I'm a caramel devil, I'm wanting you.

subtitles.original: 見惚れてしまえ最高！
subtitles.english: Be mesmerized, it's the best!

subtitles.original: 愛してみて。
subtitles.english: Try to love me.

subtitles.original: 頬を振れるぐらい焦がしてよ。
subtitles.english: Burn me so much it touches my cheeks.

subtitles.original: La la la... 虜にしちゃう。
subtitles.english: La la la... I'll captivate you.

subtitles.original: もっと離さないで。
subtitles.english: Don't let go anymore.

subtitles.original: 欲しなさい、キャラメル・デビルで。
subtitles.english: Want it, with the Caramel Devil.

subtitles.original: 君の瞳奪っちゃうから。
subtitles.english: Because I'll steal your eyes.

subtitles.original: ほろ苦い甘い。
subtitles.english: Bittersweet.

subtitles.original: まだまだ甘い。
subtitles.english: It's still sweet.

subtitles.original: くっついて離れない。
subtitles.english: Sticking together and not letting go.

subtitles.original: メルのことちゃんと見てくれてた？
subtitles.english: Were you watching Mel properly?

subtitles.original: えへへ、ありがとう。これからもずっとそばにいてね！
subtitles.english: Ehehe, thank you. Please stay by my side from now on too!

subtitles.original: 大好きだよ！
subtitles.english: I love you!

subtitles.original: 世界で一番お姫様。
subtitles.english: The number one princess in the world.

subtitles.original: そういう扱い心得てよね。
subtitles.english: Make sure you know how to treat me as such.

subtitles.original: よね！
subtitles.english: Right!

subtitles.original: みんなー！今日のライブ盛り上がってるのらー！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Today's live is getting exciting, nora!

subtitles.original: ルーナの可愛い歌声を聴いてほしいのらー！
subtitles.english: I want you to listen to Luna's cute singing voice, nora!

subtitles.original: その一、いつもと違う髪形に気がつくこと。
subtitles.english: Number one, notice when my hairstyle is different from usual.

subtitles.original: その二、ちゃんと靴まで見ること。いいね？
subtitles.english: Number circle (two), look properly down to my shoes. Got it?

subtitles.original: その三、私の一言には三つの言葉で返事すること。
subtitles.english: Number three, reply to my every word with three words.

subtitles.original: わかったら右手がお留守なのを何とかして！
subtitles.english: If you understand, do something about my empty right hand!

subtitles.original: 別にわがままなんて言ってないんだから。
subtitles.english: It's not like I'm being selfish or anything.

subtitles.original: でも君に、心から思ってほしいの。可愛いって。
subtitles.english: But I want you to think it from the bottom of your heart. That I'm cute.

subtitles.original: 世界で一番お姫様。
subtitles.english: The number one princess in the world.
